vendor_name: Andaz West Hollywood - A Concept by Hyatt
title: West Hollywood Glamour on the Sunset Strip with Daily US$50 Hotel Credit & Nightly Free-Flow Wine Hour
description:
Defined by its history as a 60s rockstar refuge and proudly the first hotel on the Sunset Strip, this iconic stay is your key to exploring the star-studded neighbourhoods of Los Angeles.

Soak up sprawling Hollywood Hills views at The Sundeck, West Hollywood's highest rooftop pool bar, and experience market-fresh Californian cuisine crafted right before your eyes in the open kitchen at Riot House Restaurant. Then, relive the golden era of rock'n'roll at the Riot House Bar, once frequented by legendary musicians.

Your base on Sunset Boulevard places you just a short drive from Universal Studios and the Hollywood Sign and offers the ultimate gateway to Beverley Hills and Santa Monica.
offer_address: 8401 Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, California 90069, United States

description: Indulge in a relaxing vacation in the heart of Goleta with a stay at Residence Inn Santa Barbara Goleta, by Marriott. Boasting classic Spanish-revival architecture made famous along the central California coastline, this hotel provides a luxurious and comfortable retreat with a gorgeous pool and courtyard area, along with a traditional American-style buffet breakfast each morning. Bask in the sunshine and head out to Goleta Beach Park, just a 30-minute drive away, for a picnic lunch and an energising walk along the pier.

Your base on Sunset Boulevard places you just a short drive from Universal Studios and the Hollywood Sign, offering the ultimate gateway to Beverley Hills and Santa Monica.

title: Discover Spectacular Yosemite National Park, Staying in Boutique Luxury from Relais & Chateaux
description: From dramatic rock faces to thundering waterfalls and ancient sequoia trees, discover the breathtaking natural splendour of California’s Yosemite National Park, staying in boutique luxury at Château du Sureau - a fairytale-style property nestled amongst nine scenic acres at the foot of the park. Stay in a romantic, individually-decorated suite with a wood-burning fireplace and enjoy daily chef-prepared breakfast, one nightly cocktail or glass of wine each in the Cellar Bar, one complimentary bottle of Coquelicot Estate Wine to share, one daily US$50 spa credit to share, a welcome drink and appetiser on arrival and more.
offer_address: 9215, 48688 Victoria Ln, Oakhurst, CA 93644, United States

title: West Hollywood All-Suite Boutique Escape with US$100 Drinks & Dining Credit & Rooftop Pool
description:
Step into a world of bohemian glamour in West Hollywood with a stay at this charming boutique that perfectly captures the fusion of European eccentricity and vintage Tinseltown flair. Nestled between two of California's most renowned boulevards - Sunset and Santa Monica - this hotel unfurls a romantic city oasis where you can seamlessly soak up the beauty of Los Angeles while regaling in the hotel's stylised interiors, reflecting Parisian, Moroccan and Spanish designs.

With a lavish rooftop - exclusive to hotel guests and offering some of the most sublime sunsets - go for a relaxing swim in the adults-only heated saltwater pool, often scented by pure damask rose essences, cosy up under the stars while enjoying a movie screening on Monday nights or explore the hotel's art galleries. When hunger strikes, savour Mediterranean-inspired fare at the alfresco restaurant, which also doubles as a hummingbird and butterfly sanctuary, and sip on expertly-crafted cocktails from the Butterfly Bar.
offer_address: 8822 Cynthia Street, West Hollywood, California 90069, United States

title: Ultra-Modern Beverly Hills Escape with Executive Lounge & Heated Outdoor Pool
description: With bold glamour and luxuries worthy of a Hollywood movie star, The Beverly Hills Marriott exceeds all expectations for comfort and aesthetic appeal. Situated in the beating heart of Hollywood, effortlessly venture to Rodeo Drive or the Hollywood Bowl or take time to relax in the heated outdoor pool or snuggled up in the stylish lounge. For your breakfast, dinner and drinks needs, look no further than the hotel’s own restaurant serving up signature cocktails alongside classic American cuisine with a Californian face lift.
offer_address: 1150 S Beverly Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90035, United States

vendor_name: Courtyard by Marriott Santa Barbara Downtown
title: Contemporary Santa Barbara Spanish-Style Escape by Marriott on State Street
description: Check into Courtyard by Marriott Santa Barbara Downtown and experience life at a slower pace as you spend memorable moments between swaying palms, red-tiled rooftops and the Pacific Ocean's endless blue. This uniquely sophisticated retreat in the heart of downtown Santa Barbara offers direct access to State Street, the city’s most celebrated avenue. Make a splash at the shimmering pool, refuel with Mediterranean fare at Saint Remy or retreat to your bright and airy guest room, featuring flexible spaces where you can work or relax.
location_description: Courtyard by Marriott Santa Barbara Downtown
offer_address: 1601 State St, Santa Barbara, CA 93101, United States

title: Laidback San Francisco Luxury in Fisherman’s Wharf with Nightly Social Hour
description:
Located in the iconic Fisherman's Wharf neighbourhood, Kimpton Alton Hotel is the ideal home base for travellers looking to explore the best of San Francisco. Featuring chic, spacious rooms, a daily social hour and an award-winning Filipino restaurant, this pet-friendly hotel is steps from the city's top attractions.

Head out to say hello to the sea lions at Pier 39 and indulge with ice cream and chocolate sundaes at Ghirardelli Square. Of course, no trip to San Francisco is complete without a visit to the Golden Gate Bridge, only a 15-minute drive away. Pier 33 is also within a 10-minute drive, allowing you to easily make your way to Alcatraz Island, the escape-proof former prison in the middle of the bay.

On your return to the hotel, Abaca Restaurant offers unique flavours and relaxed dining, while Abaca Bar is your perfect spot for small bites and cocktails. Be sure to stop by the trendy lobby lounge for nightly social hour, serving up drinks and relaxed vibes.
location_description: Kimpton Alton Fisherman's Wharf, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2700 Jones Street, San Francisco, California 94133, United States

title: Grand Opening: Los Angeles Five-Star Conrad Escape with City Views & Rooftop Pool
description: Step into a world of glitz and glamour, dreamers and creatives when you indulge in a stay at the brand-new, five-star Conrad Los Angeles. Base yourself at this sleek new outpost designed by legendary architect Frank Gehry, cast your eyes across the Walt Disney Concert Hall and downtown LA, and immerse yourself in the see-and-be-seen culture with ease. Retreat to the hotel's spectacular rooftop terrace and pool with a cocktail in hand and witness the fiery setting sun, then treat your tastebuds to San Laurel and Agua Viva with menus crafted by acclaimed chef José Andrés.
offer_address: 100 South Grand Ave Los Angeles California 90012 United States

title: Sheraton Los Angeles Escape on Iconic Hollywood Drive near Universal Studios & City Walk
description: Imagine a stay right on iconic Hollywood Drive, located just moments from the world-famous Walk of Fame and Universal Citywalk. Boasting dazzling views of the iconic Hollywood Hills, this hotel has everything you need for an unforgettable Los Angeles escape. You'll be immersed in old Hollywood glamour and enjoy the convenience of a shuttle service to and from Universal Studios Hollywood and City Walk. After days on the strip, sip and splash at The Reel Pool Bar or lounge in an inviting poolside cabana.
offer_address: 333 Universal Hollywood Dr, Universal City, CA 91608, United States

title: Sheraton San Diego City Break Glamour with Waterfront Marina Views
description: Make memories to last a lifetime while basking in the warmth of the California sun with a family-friendly stay at Sheraton San Diego Hotel & Marina, overlooking the city’s stunning waterfront. Just five minutes from the airport, this impressive, nautical-themed hotel is the perfect base to explore the city’s endless charms, whether it’s San Diego’s sensational surf or the city’s dazzling collection of world-class attractions. After days spent at San Diego Zoo or the Gaslamp Quarter, return for pub-style plates and craft beers at Quinn’s Ale House, sophisticated cocktails at the Shoreline Cantina or laze the afternoon away by the resort’s shimmering, oasis-like outdoor pool.
offer_address: 1380 Harbor Island Dr, San Diego, CA 92101, United States

title: W Beverly Hills Retreat in the Heart of Westwood Los Angeles
description: Escape to the glitz and glamour of Los Angeles’s diamond with a stay at the W Los Angeles - West Beverly Hills. Step into the sophistication of this iconic location, minutes from Rodeo Drive and the beaches of Santa Monica. Take your tastebuds on a journey with three onsite restaurant and bars - from the high-end steakhouse, STK Los Angeles, to shared plates at the al fresco Hideout oasis. Head to the poolside cabanas to unwind before you head out to enjoy the best LA has to offer - you can even bring your furry friend along.
location_description: W Los Angeles - West Beverly Hills
offer_address: 930 Hilgard Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90024, United States

title: Romantic California Vineyard Luxury with Daily Breakfast & US$100 Hotel Credit
description:
This elegant five-star hotel in Carmel Valley invites you to experience design inspired by the region's rustic charm with seemingly unending views of the surrounding vineyards and rolling mountains. Relax by the outdoor pool, enjoy a friendly match at the two onsite tennis courts or rejuvenate at the spa, where top-tier treatments beckon.

For renowned dining, look no further than the award-winning Lucia Restaurant & Bar, offering an array of all-day dining options. Venture beyond the lodge to explore some of the world’s finest wineries. Indulge in wine tastings, savour farm-to-table dining at local restaurants, visit Carmel Beach or drive along the stunning Big Sur coastline.
offer_address: 415 West Carmel Valley Road, Carmel Valley, California 93924, USA

title: Downtown Palm Springs Oasis with Shimmering Outdoor Pool
description: Walk in the footsteps of the rich and famous with a stay at the quintessentially Californian Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel. Located in the heart of downtown Palm Springs with all the stylish trimmings - and just two hours from pulsing Los Angeles - this designer retreat promises a celebrity-grade escape. Set against the backdrop of majestic mountains and palm tree-fringed roads, this impressive hotel weaves the magic and breathtaking beauty of the desert into every aspect of its design. Plunge into the shimmering outdoor pool, toast to your stay around fire pits at Rocks bar, or use this iconic oasis is your launchpad for delving into the star-studded Coachella Valley.
offer_address: 888 E Tahquitz Canyon Way, Palm Springs, CA 92262, United States

vendor_name: JW Marriott Desert Springs Resort & Spa
title: Californian Palm Desert Luxury with Daily US$100 Resort Credit
description: Experience the beauty of the desert with a stay at the breathtaking JW Marriott Desert Springs Resort & Spa. Set on 450 acres of vibrant desert gardens, surrounded by sweeping mountain ranges and signature lakes, this stylish retreat attracts international travellers, local Californians and the who’s who of Hollywood. Choose from nine acclaimed dining venues, dive into the three shimmering pools, rejuvenate at The Spa at Desert Springs and tee off at the 18-hole Desert Springs Golf Club. If you can tear yourself away from this elegant oasis, find yourself perfectly positioned to discover the Coachella Valley, palm-fringed Palm Springs and the nearby Joshua Tree National Park.
location_description: JW Marriott Desert Springs Resort & Spa
offer_address: 74-855 Country Club Dr, Palm Desert, CA 92260, United States

description: Check into W luxury and experience LA’s playground for the rich and famous in the most glamorous of locations - the star-studded W Hollywood. This utterly unique stay rises above the happening streets of Hollywood Boulevard, just moments from the Hollywood Walk of Fame and the Capitol Records Building. Make a splash at the shimmering rooftop pool, refuel with American cuisine at Delphine Eatery or retreat to your groovy room accented with vibrant pops of colour.

title: San Francisco Grand Hyatt Sophistication on Union Square with Daily Dining Credit
description:
Marvel at the City by the Bay's twinkling lights at this sophisticated hotel, towering above Union Square and the bustling streets below. Your ideal position in Downtown San Francisco let's you experience the city like a local, with premium shopping, theatres and galleries, as well as the iconic trolley cars right on your doorstep.

You don't need to go far for exceptional dining, with the elegant OneUp Restaurant and Lounge located onsite for light meals, bar snacks and craft cocktails, and The Market cafe serving roasted Red Bay Coffee and fresh pastries to jump start your morning. When days of exploration call for some meditative self-care, head to the fitness centre to rejuvenate over panoramic city views.

title: Luxe Colonial Splendour in Downtown Los Angeles with Valet Parking
description: Enter a world of Spanish colonial splendour with a lavish stay at Hotel Figueroa, ideally located in the heart of the action in Downtown Los Angeles. Offering unparalleled elegance, modern and eclectic interiors and artistic reflections of the neighbourhood’s creative pulse, this once ladies-only hostel and now member of Leading Hotels is one of the city’s most stunning historic stays. As renowned for its substance as for its style - especially after a $55-million refresh -  Hotel Figueroa is a 14-story luxury hotel where you can experience the best of outstanding service and superb elegance. With its fetching architecture, innovative Mexican restaurant, unique pool and rustic ambience, this might just become your new go-to in the City of Angels.

description: Experience the epitome of Californian luxury at this expansive five-star Spanish-inspired retreat set amidst the rolling hills of Rancho Santa Fe. Just a short drive from the vibrant city of San Diego, Rancho Valencia Resort & Spa offers a tranquil oasis away from the city's hustle. Sip on handcrafted cocktails at The Pony Room or explore the area's renowned wineries. For the active traveller, there's a state-of-the-art fitness centre, tennis courts and a serene spa for post-workout relaxation.

description: Modern boutique-style elegance blends with the inspiring desert landscape of southern California at Kimpton Rowan Palm Springs, an IHG Hotel - an oasis with views overlooking the rugged mountain ranges from a luxurious rooftop pool and terrace. description: Experience the glamour of the City of Angels from the soaring heights of the InterContinental Los Angeles Downtown, an IHG Hotel. title: Five-Star San Diego Boutique Luxury with Rooftop Swimming Pool
description: Stay in sun-kissed bliss at the Pendry San Diego, a luxury boutique hotel boasting a dreamy downtown location in the heart of the historic Gaslamp Quarter. Between exploring the city and strolling along the marina, break out your summer read in the poolside cabanas, or treat yourself to a relaxing massage at Spa Pendry. The six onsite restaurants and bars are well worth a visit: indulge in craft beers at Nason's Beer Hall, fresh seafood at Lionfish, or classic cocktails at Fifth & Rose.

title: Glamourous West Hollywood Stay with Outdoor Pool
description: Experience the height of bohemian glamour at Kimpton La Peer Hotel, an IHG Hotel. This artfully-curated West Hollywood stay is located in Los Angeles' walkable Design District. Meet at the Courtyard Bar for a healthy, hearty Mediterranean meal, lounge poolside under the shade of leafy olive trees and journey to the Patio Bar for an icy afternoon tipple. When you are ready to explore, The Grove, Melrose Avenue and the iconic Sunset Strip are just a short drive away.

title: Sophisticated Downtown Sacramento Stay with Rooftop Pool Deck
description: Discover unparalleled sophistication in the vibrant heart of downtown Sacramento at the Kimpton Sawyer Hotel. Soak up views over the Golden One Center from the pool deck, and savour cocktails and cuisine at two onsite eateries and the downstairs Punch Club Social. When you're ready for adventure, simply cross the road to catch a thrilling basketball game, or embark on a foodie tour of the neighbourhood.
location_description: Kimpton Sawyer Hotel, an IHG Hotel

title: Stylish California Escape near Newport Beach with 7 Restaurants, Day Spa & Pool Bar
description: The epitome of coastal elegance is here at Pendry Newport Beach, a luxurious haven nestled in the heart of California's Orange County. This beachfront gem is perfectly positioned for you to explore the upscale shopping district of Fashion Island, savor exquisite dining at the renowned Newport Beach Restaurant Week, or soak up the sun at the picturesque Crystal Cove State Park. After days of excitement, retreat to the hotel's alfresco pool bar to sip cocktails while wading in crystal waters.
offer_address: 690 Newport Center Drive, Newport Beach, California 92660, United States

title: Sophisticated San Francisco Escape in Nob Hill w. Onsite Dining & Unique Tiki Bar
description:
Experience the grandeur of San Francisco with an elegant stay at the prestigious Fairmont San Francisco. Perched atop Nob Hill, this historic hotel offers panoramic views of the city and the spectacular bay. Just a short stroll from Union Square, you'll be within easy reach of high-end shopping and world-class dining.

Explore the nearby Chinatown, the oldest in North America, and savour authentic dim sum and other culinary delights. Within the hotel, indulge in locally sourced, sustainable Californian cuisine at Laurel Court Restaurant and Bar, or sip on handcrafted cocktails at the Tonga Room & Hurricane Bar, offering a tropical and festive atmosphere with its indoor rainstorms and floating stage.
offer_address: 950 Mason Street, San Fransisco, California 94108, United States

title: California 5-Star Oceanfront Paradise with 8 Restaurants, Onsite Spa & Golf Course
description: Indulge in the epitome of Californian luxury at the five-star Terranea Resort, perched on the stunning Palos Verdes Peninsula. This oceanfront haven is a paradise of refined relaxation, with four sparkling pools, a pristine nine-hole golf course and a world-class spa. Savour gastronomic delights at eight distinctive restaurants, each offering a unique culinary journey from the oceanfront dining at Mar'sel’s with elegant dinners and sophisticated brunches, to the spirited flavours of Catalina Kitchen. Head the nearby Point Vicente Lighthouse, or explore the vibrant art scene at the Palos Verdes Art Center. Return to your spacious guestroom, suite or villa to unwind in unmatched luxury and watch the sunset over the Pacific, ending another day in this coastal utopia.
offer_address: 100 Terranea Way, Rancho Palos Verdes, California 90275, USA

title: Napa Valley Hideaway with World Championship Golf Course
description: Napa Valley Wine Country is yours to discover from the comfort of the luxurious Silverado Resort and Spa. When you're not wandering across the region, bouncing between vineyards and celebrated restaurants, spend time exploring the resort's 120 hectares. Enjoy a friendly game of tennis, practice your swing on the world-class championship golf course, or succumb to total relaxation with a rejuvenating treatment at the spa. When hunger strikes, be wined and dined at The Grill.
offer_address: 1600 Atlas Peak Road, Napa, California 94558, United States

vendor_name: Hotel Figueroa - The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
title: Boutique Colonial Splendour in the Heart of Downtown Los Angeles with 6pm Late Checkout
description:
Embrace easy-going Spanish colonial splendour and unparalleled elegance at Hotel Figueroa, an iconic beacon of style located in the heart of ever-evolving Downtown Los Angeles. Once a ladies-only hostel, this long-standing hotel pays tribute to its rich history through design centred on women’s art, progressive values and European flair, with a mix of distinctive antiques, bespoke furniture and luxurious textiles. Each of its eclectically designed rooms and suites speaks to the property’s enduring creativity, which infuses traditional luxury with contemporary comfort and old-world charm.

As renowned for its substance as for its style - especially after a US$55-million refresh - Hotel Figueroa is where you can experience the best of outstanding service and pure indulgence. With its classic architecture, renowned Mexican restaurant, chic coffin-shaped pool, lush greenery, an in-house Tesla and rustic ambience, this might just become your new go-to in the City of Angels.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions:**

- Take your time on your final day with a **leisurely 6pm late checkout**
- With waived hotel facility fees, enjoy a wide range of benefits including high-speed **Wi-Fi, drop-off service in the hotel's Tesla** and much more
- Toast your City of Angels getaway with a **welcome drink on arrival** (stays of 3+ nights)
offer_address: 939 S Figueroa St, Los Angeles, CA 90015, United States

title: Luxe Los Angeles City Break near Beverly Hills with Glamorous Rooftop Pool & Bar
description: Step into Southern California style with a stay at Kimpton Hotel Wilshire, an IHG Hotel, located in the heart of the city’s prestigious Miracle Mile - just moments from Beverly Hills’ iconic, palm-swept boulevards. Head to the hotel’s spectacular rooftop pool and bar for laidback plates, mezcal-forward cocktails and sweeping views of Hollywood Hills or strike out to explore Miracle Mile’s ‘Museum Row,’ featuring the Academy Museum of Motion Pictures, the Peterson Automotive Museum and more.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Wilshire, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 6317 Wilshire Boulevard, Los Angeles, California 90048, United States

title: California Boutique Oceanfront Escape on Laidback Laguna Beach
description:
Embrace the best of California-cool with a stay at Pacific Edge Hotel, a boutique retreat on the sands of low-key Laguna Beach. Perched on prime oceanfront real estate, the hotel is drenched in Southern California style and perfectly positioned for days riding waves and sunning on the sand. It’s not all about the beach though - it's just a 10-minute walk to Forest Avenue, the town’s version of Rodeo Drive, where local designers and artists showcase their creations from independent boutiques.

Spend your days at Pacific Edge Hotel with the sea breeze in your hair, lazing on lounge chairs around the pool or on the sand. Retire for lunch to Driftwood Kitchen, where an ocean-to-table dining experience is served al fresco, or wait until later in the day to admire the Pacific sunset from The Deck, where signature cocktails, Californian wine and fresh flavours are all served as the day winds down.
offer_address: 647 S Coast Hwy, Laguna Beach, CA 92651, United States

title: Surf-Sophisticated California Oceanfront Retreat on Huntington Beach
description: Surfside serenity awaits with a laidback stay at Kimpton Shorebreak Resort, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned on the golden sands of California’s beloved surf capital. Whether you’re hitting the beach or Main Street’s brilliant boutiques - both just a short walk away - this design-led, coastal-chic hotel offers the perfect soulful retreat. Head to Pacific Hideaway for apres-surf cocktails and coastal-inspired plates, backdropped by stunning views of the shimmering ocean.
location_description: Kimpton Shorebreak Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 500 Pacific Coast Hwy, Huntington Beach, California 92648, United States

title: Glamorous Five-Star Beverly Hills Escape with Rooftop Pool, Day Spa & French Bistro
description: Experience the epitome of California-style luxury at the five-star L'Ermitage Beverly Hills, a hotel that effortlessly embodies the glitz and glamour of its prestigious location. Indulge in an elevated residential-style experience in this all-suite hotel, sample world-class dining at L’ Restaurant or pamper yourself at the Ricari Studios spa. Just moments from the designer boutiques of Rodeo Drive and the iconic Hollywood Walk of Fame, here you'll find an ideal celebrity-style escape.
offer_address: 9291 Burton Way, Beverly Hills, CA 90210, United States

title: Glamorous West Hollywood Boutique Suite Escape with Rooftop Pool
description:
Immerse yourself in the magic of West Hollywood with an escape at the beautifully bohemian Petit Ermitage. Perched between two of California's most famous boulevards - Sunset and Santa Monica - this chic boutique bolthole is perfectly located for all your Golden State adventures. Remarkable restaurants and brilliant bars are within walking distance, and it's an easy 15-minute drive to the boutiques of Beverly Hills and thrills of Universal Studios.

Petit Ermitage is a haven of European eccentricity, with suites that celebrate vintage styling and splashes of Parisian, Spanish and Moroccan-inspired design. That boutique feel continues in the common areas, with walls lined with original art from the owner’s eclectic collection - think Miro, de Kooning and Dali. However, it’s at the rooftop pool where the fun truly begins: sun yourself on one of the striped daybeds while admiring views of the Hills or settle in for a swim - it’s heated and saltwater, so it’s comfortable no matter the time of year. A nearby fire deck comes to life at sundown, best admired with a cocktail in hand from Butterfly Bar. When hunger strikes, turn to the expansive alfresco restaurant, which also doubles as a hummingbird and butterfly sanctuary.

**Luxury Escapes inclusions**

- Toast your Hollywood adventure with a **complimentary bottle of wine** from the minibar
- Live the high life with an **upgrade to the next suite category**, subject to availability

**One-Bedroom Suite Upgrade:** Spread out in the charming One-Bedroom Suite, complete with kitchenette (most rooms), king-sized bed and a separate living area.
offer_address: 8822 Cynthia Street, West Hollywood, California 90069, United States

title: Disneyland Hotel with Early Entry to Disneyland Resort, Themed Pools & Waterslides
description:
Your fairytale journey begins at this iconic resort just steps from _Disneyland Resort_ in California. Whimsically blending Disney spirited past with modern amenities, this hotel offers themed suites, six atmospheric eateries and bars, and two sprawling, retro-themed pools. There's no better way to experience The Happiest Place on Earth than by sleeping on its doorstep.

Staying at _Disneyland_ Hotel comes with exclusive perks, such as early theme park entry and movie nights for the whole family. When you're not immersed in the fun-filled theme parks, relax in a private poolside cabana and make a splash on two exhilarating waterslides. For moments of quiet amid the endless excitement, retreat to Tenaya Stone Spa for a magical massage.
offer_address: 1150 West Magic Way, Anaheim, California 92802, United States

title: Carlsbad California Resort with Wellness Spa & Championship Golf Courses
description:
Unwind in this haven of relaxation in the heart of Carlsbad, California. This resort is renowned for its world-class spa, which has undergone a multi-million dollar refurbishment, and championship golf courses, making it a favourite among leisure seekers.

Tuck into a hearty steak at Bob's Steak & Chop House, or savour a refreshing drink at Bar Traza overlooking the greens. For moments of exploration, venture out to explore the charming Carlsbad Village, or make enjoy a family day out at the nearby LEGOLAND California Resort.
offer_address: 2100 Costa Del Mar Road, Carlsbad, California 92009, USA
